posts.title: Latest Newsletter Update
posts.description: Breaking Barriers, Building Brilliance - newest update

howToUpdate: 1. Find your LinkedIn post URL (e.g., https://www.linkedin.com/posts/...)
2. Extract the activity ID from the URL
3. Replace the 'id' field above with the new activity ID
4. Update the title and description for reference
5. The website will automatically use the new posts
findingActivityId: Method 1: Look for 'activity:' followed by numbers in the LinkedIn URL
Method 2: Use developer tools to inspect the embed code
Method 3: Contact support if you need help extracting IDs
